name: Roguevive
description:
Roguevive Is an Roguelike Survive Arena.

Survive on a timed stage against hordes of enemies getting ever stronger, be it alone or with friends.

Play in your style, upgrading the attributes you feel like. Master each weapon and unlock upgrades that suit your play.

The game is still in early access, so here is a list of features currently in the game:

  • 5 starting weapons.
  • More than 20 abilities to unlock.
  • 10 stats that can be upgraded for meta progression.
